header.description: We believe that the power of design and software development helps businesses.

services.title_1: We offer a wide range of
services.description: Whether you need a stunning website, a powerful app, or a custom software solution, we can help you achieve your goals.

service_1.title: Mobile Apps Development
service_1.description: We create stunning mobile apps that deliver exceptional user experiences and business value. Whether you need a native, hybrid, or web app, we have the expertise and the tools to make it happen.

service_2.title: Web Apps Development
service_2.description: We create web apps that are fast, secure, and scalable. Whether you need a simple landing page or a complex e-commerce platform, we have the skills and experience to deliver.

service_3.title: Digital Transformations
service_3.description: Digital transformations are not just about adopting new technologies, but also about creating better experiences for your customers, employees and stakeholders. At our company, we offer end-to-end solutions for digital transformation, UX design and software development.

service_4.title: UI/UX Design
service_4.description: We help you create engaging and user-friendly products that meet your business goals and customer needs. Whether you need a website, a mobile app, a dashboard or any other digital solution, we can deliver it with quality and efficiency.

aboutUs.description_1: At our company, we combine creativity and talent to deliver innovative solutions for your digital needs. Whether you need a stunning website, a user-friendly app, or a custom software, we have the skills and experience to make it happen. We are based in Dubai, UAE, but we work with clients from all over the world.
aboutUs.description_2: By designing agile systems and expertly integrating them into your business, we handle all the technical complexities so you can enjoy the lasting benefits. All our solution are cloud native that will help our clients grow with no limitation and no legacy issues and imitations.

process_1.title: Project Idea
process_1.description: A project description in a project proposal is a brief summary of the goals, the objectives, and the need for the project, just give us the brief and the other steps will be automatically generated by our team

process_2.title: Planning & Execution
process_2.description: Involves creating a strategy for new projects. It's one of the first stages in project management. During this stage, project managers and team members take an initial idea and create a written execution plan.

process_3.title: Launch & Support
process_3.description: Project execution is the phase where project-related processes are implemented, tasks are assigned, and resources are allocated. We'll support you after the project is completed.

project_1.title: Website  Design
project_1.description: Arabee is a digital platform that makes learning Arabic easy and fun for kids aged 4 to 11. Whether at school or at home, on computers or mobile devices, kids can enjoy interactive games, videos and activities that teach them Arabic in an engaging way.

project_2.title: Mobile App Design & Development
project_2.description: Whether you want to create native apps for iOS and Android, or web apps that work on any device, YHH can help you achieve your goals.

project_3.title: Web Application Design
project_3.description: Ekhtibary Assessment Platform is a cutting-edge solution for measuring student performance and progress for Arabic language

header.description: We believe that the power of design and software development helps businesses.

benefits.title: The benefits of working with us

benefit_1.title: Customize with ease
benefit_1.description: Our software solutions are designed to meet your specific needs and preferences. You can easily modify and adjust them to fit your business goals and requirements.

benefit_2.title: Perfectly Responsive
benefit_2.description: Our software solutions are optimized for performance and compatibility across different devices and platforms. You can rely on them to deliver fast and smooth user experiences for your customers and employees.

benefit_3.title: Friendly Support
benefit_3.description: Our software solutions come with dedicated and professional support from our team of experts. You can contact us anytime for assistance, feedback, or guidance.  We are always ready to help solve any issues or challenges you may face.

company.description_1: We can help you achieve your business goals by creating and implementing effective strategies. Whether you want to increase your sales, expand your market, or improve your customer satisfaction, we can help you find the best solutions for your needs.
company.description_2: We  believe in continuous improvement as a key factor for success. That's why we always monitor and analyze the results of our campaigns, and use feedback and data to optimize and refine them. We are always looking for new ways to improve our skills and knowledge to deliver better value to our clients.

mission.title: Inspire, Innovate, Share
mission.description_1: We inspire our customers and partners with our vision of creating a better world through technology. We innovate by constantly developing new products and services that solve real problems and meet real needs. We share our knowledge and expertise with our community and the industry, fostering collaboration and learning.
mission.description_2: We believe that by following our mission, we can make a positive impact on society and the environment, while also delivering value to our stakeholders.

vision.title: Focus on continuous improvement
vision.description_1: We believe that excellence is not a destination, but a journey. We are committed to constantly improving our products, services, and processes to meet the evolving needs of our customers and stakeholders.
vision.description_2: We embrace innovation and creativity as the driving forces of our growth and success. We strive to be the best in everything we do, and to deliver value and satisfaction to our clients.

content.title_4: Information We Receive from Other Sources
content.title_5: Compliance with Laws and Law Enforcement
content.paragraph_1: We may collect personal information about you in the following ways:
content.paragraph_2: The types of information that we collect directly from you or through your use of our websites and services may include the following depending on how you interact with us:
content.paragraph_3: In order to access certain content and to make use of additional functionality and features of our websites and services, we may ask you to register for an account by completing and submitting a registration form, which may request additional information.
content.paragraph_4: If you choose to register and sign in by using a third-party account (such as your Facebook account), the authentication of your login is handled by the third party. We will collect your name, email address and any other information about your third-party account that you agree to share with us at the time you give permission for your account to be linked to your third-party account.
content.paragraph_5: YH&H Products Design Services use Personal Information for the following general purposes:
content.paragraph_6: We may receive information about you if you use any of the websites we operate or the other services we provide. We also work closely with third parties (including, for example, business partners and sub-contractors in technical, payment and delivery services; advertising networks; data and analytics providers; academic institutions; journal owners, societies and similar organizations; search information providers, and credit reference agencies) from whom we may receive information about you.
content.paragraph_7: YH&H Products Design Services cooperates with government and law enforcement officials and private parties to enforce and comply with the law. We will disclose any information about you to government or law enforcement officials or private parties as we, in our sole discretion, believe necessary or appropriate to respond to claims and legal process (including but not limited to subpoenas), to protect the property and rights of YH&H Products Design Services or a third party, to protect the safety of the public or any person, or to prevent or stop activity we may consider to be, or to pose a risk of being, illegal, unethical or legally actionable activity.
content.paragraph_8: Identity theft and the practice currently known as ”phishing” are of great concern to YH&H Products Design Services. Safeguarding information to help protect you from identity theft is a top priority. We do not and will not, at any time, request your credit card information, your account ID, login password, or national identification numbers in a non-secure or unsolicited e-mail or telephone communication. We advise you not to respond to and to promptly report any email or telephone communication purporting to be from YH&H Products Design Services in which such information is collected. For more information about phishing, visit the Federal Trade Commissionʼs website.

list_1.item_1: directly from your verbal or written input (such as by consenting to receiving marketing emails or indirectly through third parties with whom we work closely (see below “Information We Receive From Other Sources”);
list_1.item_2: automatically through our website's technologies including tracking online, such as by
list_1.item_3: (which are small text files created by websites that are stored on your computer), by smart devices, by combining data sets, by collecting data from a browser or device for use on a different computer or device, or by using algorithms to analyze a variety of data such as records of purchases, online behavioral data, or location data;

list_2.item_1: Contact details, such as your name, email address, postal address, username, and telephone number;
list_2.item_2: Internet Protocol (“IP”) addresses used to connect your computer to the Internet;
list_2.item_5: Comments, feedback, posts and other content you provide to us;
list_2.item_8: Location-aware services, the physical location of your device in order to provide you with more relevant content for your location;
list_2.item_9: Information about your personal preferences, and interests and Communications with other users of our services;

list_3.item_1: To provide our services and the website,
list_3.item_2: For billing, identification and authentication, and fraud prevention,
list_3.item_3: To analyze Site usage and improve our products and the website,
list_3.item_4: To contact you and deliver administrative notices and communications relevant to your use our products and services,
list_3.item_5: For internal market research, troubleshooting problems, and detecting and protecting against error, fraud or other criminal activity,
list_3.item_6: To enforce our Terms and Conditions, and as otherwise set forth in the Privacy Policy.
list_3.item_7: We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our website, to provide the services of the website on our behalf, to perform Site-related services (e.g., without limitation, maintenance services, database management, web analytics, payment processing, fraud detection and improvement of the Siteʼs features), to assist us in analyzing how our Site is used or to provide other business services (e.g., without limitation, debt collection, accounting, legal, auditing and banking). These third parties have access to your Personal Information only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose. Although we ensure that our third party agents (“Agents”) receiving your information are bound by confidentiality obligations. YH&H Products Design Services is not responsible for and shall not be liable for any issues that may arise regarding the Privacy Policies of any of its agents, affiliates, advertiser and/or any other third parties. By using this website, you do hereby agree to holdYH&H Products Design Services indemnify, defend and hold harmless YH&H Products Design Services from any claims and/or damages that may arise from the actions of any of YH&H Products Design Services Agents, affiliates and/or advertisers.

location.title: Come visit us.
location.description: We can discuss your requirements in person at our office. It's a calm and secure place where you will feel at home. Together we will take a deep dive into your ideas, developing them and ultimately transforming and bringing them to life /reality.

faq_1.title: What services does YH&H offer?
faq_1.paragraph: We create cloud native apps and infrastructure for web and mobile platforms. We use agile methods to deliver solutions with ongoing enhancements. We also offer ready-made solutions with advanced monitoring and security tools.

faq_2.title: How long has YH&H been in business?
faq_2.paragraph: Our team of product and software experts has over 50 years of combined experience. We started our business in 2021.

faq_3.title: Is all work done in-house by the YH&H team?
faq_3.paragraph: We combine our in-house expertise with top-notch designers and developers from Europe and Asia to offer a unique boutique service.

faq_4.title: What will be delivered and when?
faq_4.paragraph: YH&H delivers fast and reliable results. We have 4 project categories with different timelines:

faq_5.title: How do you work on a project?
faq_5.paragraph: We offer a blended solution that combines design, development and testing for your project. Our process is:

list.item_1: Research: We analyze the project requirements, features and MVP.
list.item_2: Design: We create the UI/UX design based on the MVP and best practices.
list.item_3: Development: We code the design and make it functional and responsive.
list.item_4: Testing: We verify that the product meets all the requirements and works as expected.

faq_6.title: How often will results be reported?
faq_6.paragraph: We deliver solutions in agile sprints of 2 weeks each, with ongoing enhancements. We report results after each sprint.

faq_7.title: What is the client’s involvement in the design process?
faq_7.paragraph: We value client input throughout our design process. We follow these steps:

list.item_2: Define scope of work and MVP features

faq_8.title: What tech stack is used by YH&H development team?

list.item_1: Mobile apps: React Native, Flutter, Kotlin, Swift
list.item_2: Web apps: React, Node, Laravel, Python, PHP
list.item_4: Design tools: Figma, InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop, Adobe XD
list.item_5: Operating systems: Linux, Ubuntu, Docker, Containers

faq_9.title: How can I reach out to YH&H?

list.item_1: Fill out the form on our website
list.item_2: Follow us on LinkedIn, Twitter and Facebook for updates.
list.item_3: Communicate your work briefs via email.

faq_10.title: What is the process to kick off the project?
faq_10.paragraph: The project initiation process consists of the following steps:

list.item_1: Gather client's company information and project requirements
list.item_2: Draft a business proposal outlining the project scope, timeline and benefits
list.item_3: Negotiate the project cost and payment terms with the client
list.item_4: Sign NDAs to protect confidential information of both parties
list.item_5: Finalize a contract detailing the project deliverables and expectations

faq_11.title: Who owns the code for a project?
faq_11.paragraph: The client has the exclusive right to use and modify the code for a project once they have paid the full amount and cleared any outstanding dues.

Footer.title_1:
We don't just think, we do. We don't just invent, we implement. We are the best software development companies in the region for SME bespoke solutions and building digital platforms for growth. We listen to our clients and users, and we deliver solutions that exceed their expectations. 

 Don't settle for less, work with us.
Footer.title_2: We’re a team of thinkers, doers, inventors and implementers. We approach client and user needs with curiosity and passion, using over a decade of experience to drive success

company-info.title: We build digital
company-info.description: Whether you need to modernize your business, improve your user experience, or create innovative software solutions, we are here to help. We are a team of experts in digital transformation, UX design, and software development. We have the skills, experience, and passion to deliver high-quality results that meet your needs and exceed your expectations.
